about_the_game:
Demo Features

  • Opening tutorial

  • Blue Moon Cliffs prologue level including boss fight

  • Beat Blade upgrade scene with special abilities tutorial and parry practice minigame

  • Ability to replay Blue Moon Cliffs level with the Beat Blade and its powers unlocked

  • Score Mode unlockable for Blue Moon Cliffs. Can you beat the challenge time and challenge score?

  • World map teasing future levels planned for the final game

  • Customisable options

  • A total of 7 original music tracks composed by the developer, influenced by jazz fusion, rock and classic video game music. Demo soundtrack available as DLC!

Make Sungaia Your Playground

Combine fun platformer movement and fluid combat with rhythm elements as you storm different locations across the land of Sungaia (NOTE: This demo only includes the Blue Moon Cliffs level).

As newly-appointed Blade Guardian Yinyang, learn techniques that use various types of ki energy such as fire, wind and metal!

An important decision you make will determine which territories and bosses you face throughout your journey to save your brother (NOTE: In this demo, the decision only gives different dialogue and slight world map changes).

If You Can't Beat Them, Copy Them

Harness the sonic powers of the Beat Blade! Parry enemy attacks then mimic them by catching the rhythms of their sonic vibrations. Use the stolen moves to fight back or discover hidden secrets in the environment.

Two Rival Clans, One Divided Land

The Iruha Clan runs the western half of Sungaia. They are a traditional clan of blade wielders and martial artists, led by the elderly Chief Rezru, with their key territories protected by the Blade Guardians.

The Laruha Clan occupies East Sungaia, governed by Premier Elemi who defends the land alongside her clan’s best fighters. They promote technology and equality, rejecting old-fashioned thinking and religion.

Chief Rezru has two warrior grandsons - Arangei, training to be the next Chief of Iruha, and his younger brother Yinyang. When Premier Elemi offers Yinyang his kidnapped brother back in return for fighting for the Laruha Clan, Yinyang must make the hardest decision in his life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Additional Notes: The game has not been tested on less powerful devices. It may run fine on them, so please feel free to try the demo (NOTE: Steam no longer supports versions below Windows 10)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: Modern screens with variable refresh rate recommended for highest visual quality

short_description: In this rhythm-action platformer, take the Beat Blade in hand and parry, slash and catch the beat to mimic enemies' special moves! This demo includes the prologue level, the first boss and an unlockable Score Mode.
